content.detailedDescription: While driving on ohio drive in frisco the sky was very clear.  i saw what appeared to be a green fireball.  it reminded me of 4th of july fireworks however it was just one fireball and very large.  my 13 year old was in the car and i yelled "look" and we both were like wow.  we determined it couldn't be a meteor as we saw a meteor shower two summers ago and it looked nothing like that.  we also said why would someone just shoot one firework in the sky and it didn't drop pieces of fire.  it just very slowly shot across the sky and went down and just dissappeared.  there was also what appeared to be an airplane traveling in the same direction and i was wondering if they saw what we saw.
content.summary: Bright green fireball with a little white glow

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the highway coming out of grand rapids and looked out the window of the car and saw what looked like a shooting star. then the star looking object got bigger and turned all types of neon colors and it had what looked like a trail of colorful fire behind it and started shooting towards the ground. then the trail of fire went away and it looked like a ball that was about 4 times bigger than a star, but it was very colorful. like every neon color. then it started decending towards the ground and the trail of neon fire reappeared and it shot off towards the ground and dissapeared. it was near a bunch of factories and a smoke tower in grand rapids michigan. it all happened so fast but i heard my friend next to me say o my god and i knew she saw it too. then i started freaking out and hyperventalating and almost crying because i was just so in awe of what i just saw. there was no other explanation for it.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Fireball,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Saw ufo fly through air huver and then disapear and very colorful

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the patio at a house in emerald isle smoking a $5.25 cigar. i looked up and was followinf whar i thought to be a helicopter flying down the beach very high up. all of a sudden the light zipped back (and i di mean zipped back to where i 1st started watching it !!! there were 3 in all. i looked at the cigar and then started yelling (ya'll better get out here "to my son, daughter-in-law, wife and grand-children to get out there !!! all i could see were green objects (start's) at 1st i thought that maybe saylors were flying kites with glow sticks in them they acted like kites. i got my wife, daughter-in-law, oldest son (the grandkids were going ballastic) i got my digital camers in-zoomed in all the way and started snapping pictures. i have one that you can see a v shape with windows on 2 sides. they made no noise and would change shapes into see through "orbs" at will.  they could move miles at the blink of an eye or fly as slow as a feather in the wind. the pictures will help.
freeked us all out, scared the crap out of us to.
i can photocopy you the pictures with a scanner (can't figure out how to hook mine up) but, i have friends at church with a scanner that works and will do so sunday (if they come to church !!!) if not, i will try to connedt mine to my computer. i am sure that you will be impressed. i watch alot of ufo programs on the educational channels.
my feelings said (that is a ufo) it could-not have been anything elce. unless some sailors on off shore boats hat cables 2 & 1/2 miles long and had; very good contral of the kites they were flying. however, i have never seen a kyte fly straight for 1 mile them immediately go back to it's starting place in the bling of an eye. impossible, unreal, fasinating.
my wife and daughter-in-law watched them the longest. grandad had to take care of the histerical grandchildren !!!
content.summary: I was at the beach out on the patio smoking a cigar and was watching a greanish object (i thought to be a helocopter) flying for 5 or so minutes. all of a suden, it zipped back to where i 1st saw it in a split second.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened less than three hours ago!!!


i am a 43 yr old college professor in savannah. my six year old son and i had been playing in the park today. we were riding push-scooters, playing frisbee, and enjoying the lovely afternoon/evening for about an hour and a half. we walked a friend to her apartment adjacent to forsyth park. we then headed across the park toward our truck to go home.
 
i was the first to see and point out a boomerang formation of 7-11 star-like lights. they became more clear as they went almost overhead (the flight path when the object(s) were most overhead were at 1 a clock west (angle relative to us). we were both baffled. 

the light formation was heading directly north (i google mapped when i got home to get a clearer sense of the direction they are going relative to the park which is exactly rectungular). exactly north!

the formation of lights on the boomerang were not exact, but almost (in terms of exact distances from one light to the next spread through the boomerang formation...They were a little irregular. however, they were clearly in a boomerang type formation. we observed this formation fly in a very straight smooth direction due north. the observation of this lasted, i would guess, 12-15 seconds, until the boomerang formation became obscured by the atmospheric cloudiness and trees. 

the part of the park we were observing from allowed us to see a lot of clear sky without interruption (an open and large grass field). our view of the boomerang formation was (using clock hands as description of angle relative to us) was from 10 a clock to 2 a clock (we had a wide field of vision from our vantage point). 

it was almost completely dark outside. the sky above us was pretty clear and one could see stars clearly. from a distance, the atmospheric haze (toward the horizons) made the boomerang formation of lights dissipate as the lights entered from and then vanished toward the horizon.

there was no noise of airplanes or helicopters. 

then we saw the same thing happen again about half a minute later!!  same formation type, same approximate size, same direction, same rate of speed. i couldn't tell distance clearly and i could not tell if solids connected the lights or if the lights were independent. within the formation they seemed fixed.  my guess is that the boomerang formations were at least half a mile to two miles above us. if i extend my arm and hold my thumb out, i would say the formation would be about 1/2 to 2/3 of my thumb.

less than a minute later we saw a third boomerang formation!

then we saw a fourth and fifth one flying together side by side about a minute later. same flight path...Same everything!!!!!

after that (just a second or two later) we saw (i saw and then pointed it to my son who saw everything i saw) something more orb-like fly ( a single spheric light, which i think curved in flight (not flying straight). that lasted about two to three seconds and dissapeared from view because of the trees. that object was flying se and looked much further than the boomerangs. my recollection is that this orb light changed colors several times in that short amount of time.

then we saw a sixth boomerang formation....Same everything....!!!!! i couldn't believe how many we got to see. different than if we just saw one.

i think we saw a total of 7 boomerang formation over a five minute period. my son says we saw eight. i lost count. only once during that time did we see more than one at a time. the time between one sighting to the next varied from 10 seconds to less that two minutes. the time we did see more than one at a time they seemed to almost touch (wing to wing). 

and we also saw (the previously described) s-e orb that we lost sight of behind the trees. the orb was not on the same flight path as the boomerangs. we saw it at 11 o'clock (angle) se of us heading (quick curved flight pattern) aprox. se.

being a rational man i tried to think what they could be. i have no idea. they were too fast for migrating birds and we don't see that kind of bird formation here ever and birds don't have glowing light. they were absolutely not a planes and did not have blinking lights or make noise. 

the lights on the boomerang formation were not as bright or sharp as that of stars, although they looked somehow bigger than the size of individual stars to the naked eye.

the entire incident lasted about five minutes. i was on the phone telling a friend (the one we walked to her apartment) what we'd just seen (i was excited and needed to tell someone)...When we saw the last (seventh or eighth boomerang), she could hear us as we again were baffled, excited, (i probably swore several times in awe and excitement!).

the speed and size of these things relative to where we were standing would be like that of a big handglider 200-300 feet above us. the boomerang formations all flew completely straight and at a smooth and consistent speed. all the objects (except the orb) were almost exactly on the same flight path. all the boomerang formations were heading exactly north. 

my son and i both saw every detail that i describe. i was so glad to be able to share the experience with someone else and i can only imagine how this will stay with him the rest of his life, as it will mine.

this is not the first time i've seen very odd ufo phenomenon. when i was a child on vacation on lopez island (washington state), i saw a daytime moon shaped/sized/glowing object fly at a very high velocity over my head (i read that pres. carter saw something very similar). i saw it alone. it lasted maybe one second.

this sighting dwarfs my childhood experience. and having a second witness gives it a different sense of solidity.

can't think of anything else to say......
content.summary: Multiple sightings in five-minute span

content.detailedDescription: It first starts off as me doing my daily routine when its bedtime; i am watching t.V. because it helps me sleep. anyways long story short when i decide that i am going to bed i get up and started to take my contacts out i noticed this strange but somehow familiar object. i stopped doing what i was doing and focused in on the object, which was very, very close to me from my window and was staring down at me. the ufo was circular and i could only see the light on the inside of the craft, with a being inside it, but could only see the outline of his body... which was black because it was dark out and the only bright light was inside of the craft. it was not human, but humanoid, because it had a noticeably bigger head than a humans. shorty after i noticed it, it rotated away from me and shot of towards the sky. i can still show where it shot off too this day, and have seen multiple sightings since.
content.summary: Circular ufo sighting from my window.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, granddaughter and i were in our back yard setting off fireworks on the 4th of july, it was towards dusk. suddenly, my wife said in a very excited voice," eric what is that". i looked toward the sky and noticed a bright spherical object in the sky almost directly above our heads. the object was making very erratic movements in the sky and ducking in and out of the clouds.
my wife went in and grabbed the video camera, and immediately started filming the object. we were able to capture 10-15 minutes of film before the object disappeared. 
the next night we were describing our experience to my wife's son( my stepson) and his girlfriend. they told us they had experienced the exact same phenomenon. we loaned them our video camera and they filmed about 45 minutes of additional footage of the same object.
the footage that we have is on 8mm beta film and we do not have the technology to convert it to our computers for attachment to this statement. we would like to have an expert look at this footage, but are hesitant to let it out of our sights. if you can help us please contact me via cell phone, or my email which is;
                    *(wit's email address deleted--cms/sg)
thank you for your interest in this matter, 
                sincerely, *(wit's and wife's names deleted -- cms/sg)
                holt, michigan.
content.summary: A glowing spherical object object over our house.

content.detailedDescription:
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

i was approached by this thing around 6:45 to 7pm.  this is just a clip of the footage.  i slowed it down, because it was pretty shakey, as i was sitting in the truck when the event occurred(no tripod).  it is pretty clear that people don't know what to think of this, and turn to ridicule as a way of expression.  the rest of this footage is quite shocking and shows the extent of the deception involved with this phenomenon.  for me it is as simple as easy math, to explain this phenomenon.  for others not so.  i have been aware of this for some time, and have documented all phases of the aerial phenomenon that i am aware of.  they are known for throwing curves though.
content.summary: *link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting in my wife's van outsice k mart with my camera looking for cloud formations to photograph when suddenly i saw two very shiny round chrome-like objects moving fast...Making no noise shoot into a cloud bank nearly overhead. i tried to get off two shots but did not get the objects. they were one behind the other about the same size. i was in usaf and am familiar with most flying machines..Helicopters...Of which i shot a photo of one while waiting there and planes...Also of which i shot a photo of one while sitting there.  both made considerable sound. these two made no sound. the clouds were pretty extensive but i could see the far end of them and kept waiting for them to come out the other side but i never saw them. they seemed too small for a large plane and no wings...Too fast for a balloon... size is difficult but considering the height of the clouds i'd guess they had to be 15-30 ft in diameter headed south. 


i have only seen one other set of ufos that i could not explain and that was in the 1980s over a field in nw florida which numbered either 5 or 7 solid black cigar shaped objects. not helicopters...As we have the worlds largest helicopter base in the world near here and i am familiar with helicopters quite well. no rotors at all. but this was seen by me, my wife and child. my wife seems to have some memories of some incident but no details and my daughter (a child then) remembers nothing. again it was a momentary sighting but too long to add here to explain why.  thank you.
content.summary: Was looking for clouds to photograph when i saw two shiny objects moving fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my veranda in my chair when a silvery ball-bearing looking object suddenly appeared in the blue, but slightly hazy sky in the southeast direction from where i was, over the area of the blue mountains.  it appeared to twinkle much like a very large star but also had the appearance of reflecting light and/or generating light.  at arm length, it was about the size of a bb.

i viewed the object for a few seconds but then i ran in my home, in a futile attempt, to get my sony digital video camera but it was gone when i went back out to attempt to video it.

this area has been very active in the last few months and my last sighting (which was much different) was seen and reported on march 5th of this year.
content.summary: The ufo looked like a silver or chrome "ball bearing" that appeared to either create or reflect light in a twinkling fashion.

content.detailedDescription:
I am aware i am little late in reporting this incident as this event took place when i was 22 yrs old ( now 35). at the time i was living in harvest alabama and was on my way to the gas station at around 10:00 pm central time to meet up with a couple of friends. i arrived at the gas station exxon on jeff rd and got out of my car to wait. it was a clear night and a few minutes passed waiting for my friends to arrive when this big triangular thing was in the sky. ( i had nothing better to do but stare into the stars waiting) the triangular thing had three red lights at each of the three points. initially i thought it was three separate floating red lights that were in perfect formation, but on closer observation the stars were disappearing in the center of where the lights were. i knew this thing was solid and moved extremely slow across the sky i would say no more than 15 miles an hour. the triangular ufo was moving slowly  west to east and i was facing the northern sky. i just stared at it in shock and a few minutes passed and it was still slowly moving east when all of a sudden one of the red lights dropped a white sparkly that started falling towards the earth. a couple more minutes passed and then another red light dropped two white sparkly lights that also started to fall to earth. this continues for about another 15 minutes and then all of a sudden the red lights simply disappears just like as if it just turned off the lights. i honestly thought i must be going crazy or something and left it alone and never spoke a word of it to nobody ever since.


well today 3-24-11 i currently live in denver colorado. i was watching our local news station and they showed a clip of a possible ufo sighting in lafayette co. needless to say my jaw dropped as those red lights they showed was exactly the same thing i saw over 13 yrs ago! the only difference was that i did not see any of the three red lights dropping the white sparkly lights that fall to the earth. i have goosebumps all over as i am typing this because i wrote it off as i was seeing things and those memories from years ago all flooded back to me. 

what those people in lafayette co captured last night on video is real! i felt like this was something i needed to finally disclose to the rest of the world.

thank you all for listening to my sighting that took place many years ago.
content.summary: Triangular with 3 lights at the points that were red solid no sound with white sparklies  falling from it

content.detailedDescription: Just to clarify the details of my sighting of the green sphere or (fireball) in the sky the night of the 23rd: this comes after reading a couple of other tx reports of the same type of sightings on the same night. before the actual 5 second occurence, i also saw three craft, and in my perspective, these were small civilian aircraft often seen coming to and from our local small airports, nothing of extrateresstrial origin. these three craft flew from east to west and seemed to be an equal distance apart, going at the same speed across the sky and the green ball event happened within a few minutes after they flew by.  this may help to exact my time of sighting. the ball also went from the south to north direction, but from my vantage point did not go as far as i30...Could be more than one ball that night?
content.summary: Clarification of event strange comet in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Me and 3 friends where camping in my friends back garden and we where all inside are sleeping bags but our body's where outside the tents asleep, i woke up and was looking up at the sky, when i first noticed the object i shouted to my friends to wake up and pointed up at the sky and said (*words deleted--cms/sg) is that and i started shivering all over) i knew straight away what it was and that was an alien craft because it couldn't have been anything else, one of my friends ran inside and would not come back out, we all seen this object about 300ft hovering above us when i pointed it out to them, the ufo was disk shaped and had red square lights in a ring around the bottom spinning clockwise and blue square lights ring around the bottom spinning anti-clockwise but in a smaller circle, the craft was just hovering in the same place directly above us for about ten minutes. after staring at it for about 5 minutes i just started smiling without knowing i was, i was also over come by this strange feeling of relaxation and serenity that i have never felt since. i also don't remember loosing sight of the object because when i was overcome with this weird sensation i must have fell asleep i just remember waking up in the next morning.

i could better describe this by speaking to someone as i find it hard to explain stuff in righting.
content.summary: Ufo hovering silently about 300ft with red & blue rings

content.detailedDescription: I was getting a ride home from a friend after we had left from a visit at a second friend's house. we were on iowa highway 57 when i happened to glance out of the front passenger side window and saw a pattern of moving lights in the sky. at first, i only saw two white lights with a smaller red blinking light in the middle, but after a moment i noticed a third white light with them, forming a triangle shape. at first i had mistaken it for the wing section of an airplane, but after seeing the third, triangle-forming light and carefully observing the way it was moving, i realized that it was not a normal aircraft and that it was extremely similar to the first one i had viewed in february. when i made this connection, i got very excited and asked my friend to stop the car. he did, and luckily for us there are not many vehicles going down the highway around midnight. i rolled down my window on the passenger side and stuck my head out to get as good a look as possible. it moved more fluidly than any aircraft i usually see, and it seemed to be rotating slightly as it passed over a neighborhood that was to my right, then over our car and off into the distance, which is a more undeveloped part of town (we were on the outskirts.) as it got further away from us, it seemed to shift slightly, and when i saw it in the distance i saw an angled row of flashing red lights.
content.summary: Second of two sightings of lighted,  triangular-shaped ufos seen near my home

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home one evening after a theater practice, i happened to look up out of my windshield and see an unusual thing in the night sky. it was a group of lights, three large white ones forming a triangle with at least one smaller, blinking red light in the middle. i seem to recall red blinking lights on the sides as well. it was slowly hovering across a main road in my town, moving from the east to the west, from the more populated and busy center to the more remote outskirts. i was hypnotized by this ufo, slowing down my car to stare at it and even driving up over a curb. after moments of it slowly seeming to hover and rotate across the road, it began to move faster and went west, causing me to lose a good sight of it. i turned off onto a side street and drove in its direction, but could not catch up. the thing that interested me the most in this experience was the fact that i saw this in the middle of town, not that late at night, so i assume many people could have and probably did witness it. i immediately posted about the events on facebook, which is why after over a month i still have a record of the date and approximate time.
content.summary: First of two sightings of lighted, triangle-shaped ufos seen near my home

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in the parking lot and i saw a ufo.
2. it was flashing red and blue lights.
3. i didn't know what it was but it was different.
4. it moved slow.
5. i was afraid.
6. it flew away and i didn't want to follow it in my truck because i was scared.
content.summary: I saw a cigar shaped ufo flying overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside on front porch with my husband. husband noticed to the south a formation of aircraft which appeared like a very low-flying airplane. at the same time to the west northwest i saw a bright green light falling in a south to north straight pattern in a slow descent toward the ground. its appearance was similar to a shooting star, but much larger, bright glowing green, and followed by what looked like a trail of fire. i don't believe this was a shooting star. immediately after its disappearance into the treeline, the aircraft to the south got closer to our home and turned out to be 3 helicopters flying in a tight triangular formation. the lead helicopter seemed to have a search light on. the rear two helicopters had no spotlight, only a red indicator light on the front of the craft. they continued in a northbound flight and disappeared.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Glowing green light shooting from sky

content.detailedDescription: It's that time of year again! my husband and i were taking out the trash and on the way back to the house, he noticed a "bright star"(1) moving quickly to the right. we both stopped and watch it "fly out of" the big dipper and and head towards the direction of orion (se to sw). after about 3 seconds it had made it half way across our visible sky and then just disappeared. we see these each year around this time and i have previously reported them. because this was something we were used to, we glanced around the sky to see if we could spot more. (we typically see more than one). it was only a few seconds later that we spotted another one(2) which was dimmer coming from the direction of orion and heading towards the big dipper (the opposite direction as the one before - sw to se). that one quickly disappeared. we then saw another one(3)! at this time we were facing the big dipper and i turned around to look behind me and saw it. again, this one was dim, but noticeable (nw to sw). we lost track of it after a few seconds. without a doubt, i know these aren't satellites, they move far too quickly and move in various directions. after about a total of 5 minutes, we had seen 3. with it being a very clear night, nothing was blocking our view. after a couple minutes of watching the sky, we saw another bright one(4) and it was easy to follow. this one "came from" orion, passed "under" sirius and faded out (but was still visible). we followed it across the sky (ne to nw) and watched as it brightened back up... only to disappear like the others. again, only seconds later, (on the complete opposite side of the sky), we saw the last and final one (ne to se). a dim one headed "into" the big dipper. once it reached the middle of the constellation, it disappeared. i have an app on my phone that allows me to track satellite movement, so i opened it and pointed it towards the sky. it showed me the orbits of the satellites and they were nowhere near the paths of these "stars". like i said, we see these often around this time of year. sometimes, it's one a week. at times, it's a couple in one night. this is the first we've seen this year, but i will keep records on them as i see them.
content.summary: 5 star-like, 2 were bright and 3 were dimmer

content.detailedDescription: This weird phenom started summer of 2010 and took place roughly 5 times then ceased.  it happened again last pm for the first time since.  i will try to describe as best as possible.  our house is a one story with a metal roof.  the incident is as follows.  it is a large gust of air that sweeps up against our exterior wall behind our bed and then onto the roof. the roof trusses then creak/squeak as if a large amount of weight has been placed upon them.  we always noticed it when the weather was calm and no wind was present.  it took place around 4am about five nights in a row then stopped.  we have 4 dobermans and they always start barking aggressively when it happens.  they're barking response is timed perfectly with the gust and trusses squeaking.  we haven't heard it in a while and just forgot about it but it happened again last pm at 430am.  my wife and i both hear it together because it is the trusses right above our bed and that exterior wall is at the head of the bed so we are right there.  it woke us both up last pm.  it's a weird thing because we always notice it when the weather is calm.  the wind gust only last a couple of seconds then the trusses creak quickly.  it sounds crazy but it makes me think of something swooping in and landing on the roof.  i know it can't be a bird because of the weight issue.  for example we had a storm a few weeks ago that had wind gusts of 80mph and the trusses creaked then.  that is the only other time i've heard them creak.  we also have never heard anything on the metal roof scratching etc.  i don't have a clue what it is.  i'm thinking of putting up a deer camera and see if i can catch a glimpse of what it could be.  i'm writing you because i'd like to know if you've heard of anything similar to this from others in the area etc.  we also live up on a large ridge and have 40+ mile views.  it would make a good perch for something.  sorry this isn't a sighting of something.
content.summary: Unexplained wind gust on roof in calm weather at same time each event

content.detailedDescription:
I heard this but i want mr carrion to know cuz i'm a believer in chris bledsoe from 'the fayettville incidnet' on the cape fear river a yr or so ago. i watched it on tv just 6 nights ago on the 18th...Strange too cuz it aired around the same day of the new supposed sighting. it was seen by several people & reported to the police. i had heard it from a woman at pat's tires who knew someone who watched it. because of the fayetville incident i think it should be looked into to vindicate mr bledsoe's claim as to the red/orange ball he & his fishing buddies observed. if it was any shape but a red/orange ball or anywhere except the cape fear region, i would not report this incident
kindest regards
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Red/orange ball in the sky on cape fear river

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i took a photo together at the boston waterfront. i held my phone out to try to get the shot and i immediately noticed the object but thought it was a plane.  i didn't get a better look at it until later in the evening when i arrived home. i took a second photo right after this one and the object does not appear. i tried putting scraps of paper on the camera lens and taking a picture to reproduce the image with no luck. it was an overcast grey day and the wind was minimal. it doesn't look like a bag or piece of trash to me. if you have seen anything that looks like this or have any suggestions for me please let me know.

thank you very much!
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: I took this picture with my smart phone and had this object show up.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the bus heading to presidio tx.On hwy. 67 so.When i saw this object like cristal made in the mountains of marfa area.I have time to capture 2 pictures of the object...I had too many experiencies of this type in del rio tx.Long time ago,i remember at least 7 times i saw ufos,at very close range,even an alien at 10 ft. away from me,i know this is very difficult to belive so i keep this away from people who don't belive me,but i have witnesses who saw same ufos with me in diferent years from 1955 to present days... in the del rio area is very commun watching those ufos...In the marfa area is very famous because the lights at nights, but this time was at 3;pm so i took this pics with my cell,and i think it was a ufo camuflaged in the ski,the ufos can be camuflaged in the skies and clouds also,or desapear completly...
content.summary: Square rectangular object

content.detailedDescription: this happened around 1979 my mom was making dinner and asked me if i wouldn't mind driving down to the "mr m" convenience store to get a few sodas for dinner and gas so she wouldn't have to do it in the morning.I drove down our street to hunt lane and made a right. i drove down to the store got the sodas and gas and started up hunt lane toward our street. between the store and our street is a small bridge and the drive is about half a mile. it was dark out around 8pm, on the right of the road is nothing but woods. i crossed the bridge and when i saw our street sign i was about to pull down the left turn signal and began to step on the brake when all of a sudden i heard this whistling noise up in the sky above and behind the car, then i heard a sound as if something metallic had fallen off the back of the car.Then this light shown down from above all over the car,i looked to my right and saw that the wooded area was all still dark so i knew that the light was only on the car.Then it was gone and this all happened in a matter of seconds.I was freaked out and then noticed that the radio was blaring and the dash board lights were working(before this incident our dash lights and radio were not working)i looked up for the street sign and stepped on the gas a little then a little more then realized i was back on the other side of the bridge(that i had already crossed) i drove home and it wasn't till i got there that i realized the radio was still blaring. i called out my mom and she asked what took so long, a trip that should have taken 10min had turned into an hour. and don't even get me started about the dreams i began to have afterward. late-c
content.summary: My ufo experience

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen this light appear almost every night. twice i have seen two other lights with it.  the most prominent light appears for about an hour and then fades.  it hovers in the same place every night. the two other lights that i have seen with it move away but this one fades to nothing like it goes away from vegas and the fade is very fast.
i smoke on my patio before i go to bed at night.  i go to sleep around 6 pm. every night. i always look at the night sky so i have seen things like this over vegas all the time. i first thought that it was a plane or a bright star but it was to low to the ground and to bright to be a star. it stays stationary and then fades to nothing, like it moves away from vegas at a high speed.
i really wouldn't have mentioned this because it is common to see such things over vegas but this is keeps happening every night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light that appears every night in the same place

content.detailedDescription:
I go to my window and i look to the west; there's a light in between the trees. if you look at it with binoculars you can see different lights going clockwise around the ufo. the ufo sometimes stays stationary when i look at it, and i come back 40 minutes later and it is gone. the other night i watched it for quite some time, and it moves around. it will then, disappear. this occurs at least 3-4 times out of the week. i'd really appreciate if you could bring a camcorder or some kind of recording device when you come to talk to me, it would be best if you came at night. 
i have a a video on my surveillance camera that i have recorded of a ufo in the sky. you would have to come to my house to see the video, i have no other means to shows this video because it's on a vhs.
content.summary: Ufo flies up and down, maneuvers around and just disappears sometimes.

content.detailedDescription: Weather permitting, for the past 6 years during the summer months, i would lie prone on a beach chair familiarizing myself with natural and manmade objects in the night sky. i have located 8 transport craft that eject orbs or scout craft that appear to follow a preplanned mission. both craft project a magnitude 3 in brightness, the scout craft are smaller and appear as pinpoints of light. it is impossible to ascertain whether they are luminous or have lights on the exterior structure. the transport craft launch the minute objects and often move toward them to assist in their recovery. as far as equipment, i use a meade telescope, canon stabilized binoculars, and a 500 mw green laser. i plan to refine my search and observation methods this summer.
content.summary: Motherships and scout craft

content.detailedDescription: After a long day, i was sitting in a patio chair on my back deck, trying to relax,looking up at the night sky.  i noticed a very bright what i thought was a star, but was changing colors, red,blue,white,green, and moving slightly at first then making strange patterns in the sky.  i went inside the house and grabbed my digital camera, walking back outside i took a few pictures, and then decided to take video for the time that my camera allowed.  i took video for about 4 minutes, and then it disappeared.  i downloaded the video and pictures to my home computer, and viewed them and was not impressed with the quality.  thinking no more about it till my home computer started to run slowly and purchasing a new one was the only option. i started to go through all the family video and photos and which one to save and put on my new computer, i came across the video/pictures i took last august. i put them on my computer and with the new media viewer installed looked at the photos and zoomed in and to my shock i saw what looks like a star in the center of a swirling mass. the next photo is the same thing but with what looks like the profile of a face sticking out of the star shaped object. i was spooked to say the least.
content.summary: Ufo with face looking down

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were driving down a road outside of dallastown pa and we both noticed a bright ligth beaming on the ground, at first we thought 
it was someone spotting dear and all of a sudden it appeared right in front of us at tree top level, i stopped the car and couldn't beleive what i was seeing. it was so close that i couldn't tell the exact shape because i was looking up through a tree canopy but it appeared to be oval or roundish in nature it was beaming a bright light all around the ground like it was looking for something, it seemed so close i could hit it with a rock and all i know it was huge and had band of lights of differant colors that looked like colored glass and it didn't make a sound and was moving real slow my heart was pounding out of my chest i couldn't take my eye's off of it and thought at first i might be killed or something  it just seemed to just move out of sight. i had to keep this all bottled up for all these years. my friend and i swore never to tell anyone because they would say we were crazy. but after watching your show today on tv i decided to tell someone. the sad part is i don't have any pictures or other proof but since that day there is no doubt in my mind that some other life is out there. i know it sounds hard to beleive but that's what i saw and i've never been a liar. 
 
thank you  
 
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Passed in front of me right above tree tops

content.detailedDescription: Turned off rt 41 in 1970 impala with friend to urinate, after hunting in area- noticed strange series of lights just hovering in sky- upon trying to get closer view- vehicle was shut down- and hovering objects approached our vehicle- besides the triangles their were bell shaped objects also- also off in distant horizon was cigar shaped vehicle-- triangles their were 6-8 came down 1 by 1 as if to check us out- 1 was hovering off to our south side about 400yrds and a tether line with a series off tube shaped objects was dangling in the wind on the end of it- but the 1 that got the closest i,ll never forget it came at us out of the hoizon and shut off all it,s light,s except for the front i guess i,ll call it cockpit- and it was looking at us as intently as we were trying to look at it and as it reached the point directly over our vehicle i rolled down the window stuck my head out and looked directly at its massive system of louvers, best i could describe as smacking in unison all over the bottom of the ship in all directions in unisun, but simaltainesly, very beutiful view of technology and grace- have much more info but i.M not really i prolific writer  have no reason to lie- when they finally ended what i guess i.Ll call their show our vehicle started up again and we proceeded home told people and became laughing stocks-- my belief is the real mccoy.S only expose themselves or vehicles to certain people-- why--not sure --  because i have had other sightings with witnesses including a fireball with 2 smaller balls that looked like it was assisting the fire ball in in its flight right over a busy interstate.
content.summary: Triangle with 1 point cut off-- shut vehicle down-- close view - had elaborate system of louvers slapping in precise order

content.detailedDescription: i was out side looking at the stars and saw three objects with four lights just hovering they moved in like a flash movement and hovered agian. i've seen this several times before but never really paid this any attention untill i seen this several times it keeps me woundering if this is ufo activity. being that fort bragg and camp mccall is near i was afraid to say anything about this. the ufo's would always be in diffrent places in the sky with the same type of activity a flah like movement and then hovering. i would go inside my house and look out the window and still see the ufo's. i was afraid so i would say to myself that's not a ufo so i would go to bed.  the next night i was outside and saw the same thing agian.  it is now 2011 and the month of june and july is comming so i may see these ufo's agian.  i've lived here for eleven years and every once in a while i would see these objects winter and summer.  what really made me notice the objects is when the lights flashed and the objects moved in a flash like movement. i thought that the objects were a military type of craft and i know a moving plane when i see it. these objects are always the same and the movements are the same.
content.summary: Two small crafts one large in the middle four lights on each red blue and yellowish orange

content.detailedDescription: It was appoximately 3 years ago so time of day and month are a little foggy to me. i currently reside in town of glen wild new york. at the time i was employed at outback steakhouse in miiddletown new york. i got ready for work was closing restaurant that nite so i was in little later that day. i was driving on route 17 headed to middletown when i was drivin thru wurtsboro valley still in 17 when i noticed something out of corner of left eye. seemed like small comet, leading fireball with long tail. i then slowed down to get a better look at it when i saw it,dont know if u would call it crash,but disappeared quickly into swamp. was some distance off approx 5-7 miles most and there was a mountain behind it so was able to  to view entire thing til gone. it probably only lasted a minute or two. there was no impact explosion, was like it knew where it was goin. never told anyone about cause didnt want all the jokes n all else that goes with it. after watchin your show on tv i thought maybe should tell you people, might be first time you could actually find something. no fake pictures of stuff to be examinedby yours there and our professionals. just some swamp exploring, could probably pinpoint smaller area that 5 - 7 mile radius. was pretty exciting, kind of like a small shooting star, but never saw one that close let alone crash or land however its termed. would like to say for the record, do i know what it was, no. did i see something i've never seen before with a finish that doesnt make sense, yes. it was goin wayto fast to stop that quick but yet no impact explosion of any kind. just thought i'd share story n maybe help put an end to question, are we alone?
content.summary: Similar to that of a comet. leading was fireball with long tail.
